text: Mercè Bonell i Bertran is an Andorran politician, first female member of the General Council after replacing a councilor on 20 November 1984. She was member of the Liberal Party of Andorra.Les dones al Consell General MERCÈ BONELL: «Andorra va tenir una consellera abans que Suïssa» Mercè Bonell: "Vaig entrar al Consell General espantada" ==References== Category:Living people Category:Andorran women in politics Category:Liberal Party of Andorra politicians Category:Members of the General Council (Andorra) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mercè Bonell
